body:
Users of LightWave and those in the know,


I have noticed that exporting an object from LightWave (.lwo) to 
WaveFront OBJ format yields a .obj file that does not specify the 
surface normals ("vn").  I can actually bring the .obj file into Poser 
and then re-export it as an .obj and, voila, the surface normals are 
included.  Anyone know what tweaks can be done or options can be 
exercised within  LightWave to export objects in .obj format with 
surface normals ("vn") listed in the file?  This is helpful when trying 
to use the obj2rad command and the -s option with obj2mesh for 
smoothing purposes.


Thanks!


kirk
